value.cfrText: Try your first search here and discover something new.
Try your first search. Look for movies to stream, shopping deals, news stories to read, or any topic you can think of.
Try your first search. We’re automatically blocking known trackers to give you speedier results.
Search with peace of mind. Firefox automatically blocks known trackers that follow you from site to site.

data.userFacingName: Felt Privacy - Android
data.userFacingDescription: Copy focused on privacy

default-browser.title: We love keeping you safe
default-browser.body:
Our non-profit backed browser helps stop companies from secretly following you around the web.

Learn more in our privacy notice.

sync-sign-in.title: Stay encrypted when you hop between devices
sync-sign-in.body: When you’re signed in and synced, you’re safer. Firefox encrypts your passwords, bookmarks, and more.

notification-permission.title: Notifications help you stay safer with Firefox
notification-permission.body: Securely send tabs between your devices and discover other privacy features in Firefox.

default-browser.title: Du entscheidest, was Standard ist
default-browser.body:
Nimm nicht das Erstbeste, sondern das Beste für dich: Firefox schützt deine Privatsphäre.

Lies unseren Datenschutzhinweis.

sync-sign-in.title: Alles ist dort, wo du es brauchst
sync-sign-in.body: Wenn du willst, bringt Firefox deine Tabs und Passwörter auf all deine Geräte.

notification-permission.title: Du bestimmst, was Firefox kann
notification-permission.body: Benachrichtigungen helfen dabei, Downloads zu managen und Tabs zwischen Geräten zu senden.
